name: PB_ACCT_TX_USED_TX_HX
description: Table that stores PB payment posting set IDs used in transaction set history.

columns.name: PB_ACT_TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the account transaction record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: USED_TX_HX_TRANSACTION_SET_ID
columns.description: Stores the Premium Billing transaction set IDs which have used this transaction.
